summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of West Garfield Street from Fifteenth Avenue West to Twenty-third Avenue West, et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing a plank roadway to and authorizing, a reassessment under Ordinance No. 28188 affirmed Oct. 18, 1911 under Ordinance NO. 23102, creating Local Improvement District No.2265 Rea. Prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
